system.description: When you call out an injustice that a hero has perpetrated, roll + Danger.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: They dismiss you; mark a condition (their choice), shift Danger up, Savior down.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
Choose one.

  • You get them to admit their wrongdoing
  • You win over an onlooker; take Influence over them
  • You don’t turn their attention and anger onto yourself

success.label: Success!
success.value:
Choose two.

  • You get them to admit their wrongdoing
  • You win over an onlooker; take Influence over them
  • You don’t turn their attention and anger onto yourself
